Name: Treasure Hunt
Story Background: In search of hidden riches, the explorer delves deep into uncharted territories, hoping to stumble upon a cache of valuable artifacts.
Ability: Reveal the top X cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
Appearance Description: A lone adventurer with a tattered map, eagerly scanning the horizon for signs of buried treasure amidst a lush, unexplored landscape.
